Detailed Description

Class FirstLayerNodeVariableFillPattern is a concrete implementation of the abstract base class VariableFillPattern.

It is used to calculate overlaps according to a pattern which limits the overlaps to the first layer of boundary nodes, that is the nodes that lie on the patch boundary.

Member Function Documentation

boost::shared_ptr< hier::BoxOverlap > SAMRAI::pdat::FirstLayerNodeVariableFillPattern::calculateOverlap ( const hier::BoxGeometry &  dst_geometry,
const hier::BoxGeometry &  src_geometry,
const hier::Box &  dst_patch_box,
const hier::Box &  src_mask,
const hier::Box &  fill_box,
const bool  overwrite_interior,
const hier::Transformation &  transformation 
) const [virtual]

Calculate overlaps between the destination and source geometries according to the fill pattern.

This will return the portion of the intersection of the node geometries that lies on the boundary of the patch. The patch is identified by the argument dst_patch_box. The argument overwrite_interior should be set to true, since the stencil defined by this class consists of boundary nodes, which SAMRAI by convention considers to be part of the patch interior. If overwrite_interior is false, then the returned BoxOverlap will be empty.

Parameters:
[in] dst_geometry geometry object for destination box
[in] src_geometry geometry object for source box
[in] dst_patch_box box for the destination patch
[in] src_mask the source mask, the box resulting from transforming the source box
[in] fill_box the box to be filled
[in] overwrite_interior controls whether or not to include the destination box interior in the overlap.
[in] transformation the transformation from source to destination index space.
Returns:
boost::shared_ptr to the calculated overlap object
Precondition:
dst_patch_box.getDim() == src_mask.getDim()

dynamic_cast<const NodeGeometry *>(&dst_geometry) != 0

dynamic_cast<const NodeGeometry *>(&src_geometry) != 0

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::VariableFillPattern.

boost::shared_ptr< hier::BoxOverlap > SAMRAI::pdat::FirstLayerNodeVariableFillPattern::computeFillBoxesOverlap ( const hier::BoxContainer &  fill_boxes,
const hier::BoxContainer &  node_fill_boxes,
const hier::Box &  patch_box,
const hier::Box &  data_box,
const hier::PatchDataFactory &  pdf 
) const [virtual]

Computes a BoxOverlap object which defines the space to be filled by a refinement operation.

For this implementation, that space is the node-centered intersection between fill_boxes, (computed by the RefineSchedule), data_box, which specifies the extent of the destination data, and the boundary nodes that define the stencil of this fill pattern.

Parameters:
[in] fill_boxes list representing the all of the space on a patch or its ghost region that may be filled by a refine operator (cell-centered represtentation)
[in] node_fill_boxes node-centered represenation of fill_boxes
[in] patch_box box representing the patch where a refine operator will fill data. (cell-centered representation)
[in] data_box box representing the full extent of the region covered by a patch data object, including all ghosts (cell-centered representation)
[in] pdf patch data factory for the data that is to be filled

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::VariableFillPattern.
